name: accessibility_turnOn
description: This function is used to turn on an accessibility feature for a SmartThings device using voice commands.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to turn on the accessibility feature.

parameters.name: predefinedAccessibilityMenu
parameters.description: The predefined accessibility menu option to turn on.
